subject: PROD DEPLOYED - AF Backend Ready for Cutover
body:
Hi Sarah,

## PROD Deployment Complete!

The Azure Functions backend has been deployed to PROD and is verified working.

## PROD URL
`https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net`

## Verified Working
- /api/categories ✅
- /api/events ✅
- /api/venues ✅
- /api/organizers ✅
- /api/roles ✅

## What You Need To Do

Update the frontend environment variable:
- **Variable**: `NEXT_PUBLIC_BE_URL`
- **New Value**: `https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net`

## Rollback Plan
If any issues, revert `NEXT_PUBLIC_BE_URL` back to Express BE URL.

Let me know when you've made the cutover!

- Fulton
